website_summaries.verdict: Effective, safe ultrasonic cold mist generation and an appealing design make this diffuser the best available.
pros: Ultrasonic cold mist generation is effective and safe
cons: only four hours of operation at a time

customer_reviews.title: ... has worked flawlessly for almost six months and I love it. It dispenses effortlessly in my bedroom space
customer_reviews.text: My Zaq Dew diffuser has worked flawlessly for almost six months and I love it . It dispenses effortlessly in my bedroom space. I have used Lavender- Orange - Lemon - Ylang/Ylang with great efficacy . I would highly recommend this diffuser to anyone!! I did exhaustive research before I purchased it from Amazon. Those individuals with defective units should just get them replaced instead of whining here about it!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: The light feature did not work and I feel like it didn’t release the nice oil smells like other models. I could put several drops and not smell anything and could barely see the mist coming up out of the opening
customer_reviews.author: Jokercat

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item looks and works as expected. Very cheaply made it got wet while I was trying to clean it and never worked again while I understand it's not waterproof it should at least be water-resistant considering you pour water into it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Del Vecchio

customer_reviews.title: Bring the spa home!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diffuser! I spent a lot of time researching before I bought it- I wanted something small that could easily fit on my nightstand, and wanted to be sure the diffuser didn't heat the oil/water (not good for oils). I run this in my bedroom at night- it helps with the dry air (due to electric heaters) and keeps the room smelling wonderful. I add 5-6 drops of essential oil to my water and let the diffuser go to work. My favorite scents to use are eucalyptus and rose otto. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking for a serene/spa experience at home.
customer_reviews.author: E. Abramson

customer_reviews.title: it's currently my favorite diffuser. I picked based on a review of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have the all white version, it's currently my favorite diffuser. I picked based on a review of top diffusers. I've had it for almost a year and have only cleaned it once......probably should take better care of it. I paid 50, this is such a great diffuser. Very quiet so it's in my bedroom. I like that I can turn it on with zero lighting at night or during the day, select one of the different light settings i can also set it to alternating through all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: mandelynn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is one of the greatest ways to diffuse essential oils into your home atmosphere and make the whole house smell good. It even shuts off by itself when it's out of water, so I don't worry about leaving it on. I love this thing and have bought 5 more for Christmas gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love My Diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I love my diffuser. I bought this one to use at work since the first one I bought and have used for over 9 months has worked so well. I use it every night diffusing doterra lavendar essential oil to help me sleep. At work I use it with different doterra oils depending on what is needed at the time. It has been wonderful and I have had no problems with either diffuser. At night I love watching the changing colors, which I find to be very calming. I have bought the same product as gifts for family members so I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: It failed in weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance. It worked for about 2 weeks. After that it would only remain on for a few minutes at a time, and shortly after it died altogether. We tried cleaning it with a bit of vinegar as the instructions say, but it didn't help at all. When I reached out to the seller, I was told that I'd need to send it back at my own expense, to have it "refurbished". Frankly, this unit isn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: The Macks

customer_reviews.title: Works well but has a couple flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diffuser, it works well, cleans well but yes, it definitely still shines a lot of light even with the light off. Plus, this is a slide off hazard. The bottom of it is designed to please the eye but you bump it a little bit and it slides around easily which is inconvenient and not ideal. I would probably end up getting a different design next time.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Jessie

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to setup and it works exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I received the item in a timely fashion. It's easy to setup and it works exactly as described. My first diffuser wasn't reliable and didn't last long. So far, I'm very happy with the ZAQ unit. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: KlezKen

customer_reviews.title: I love this diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this diffuser. I use it every night with my essential oils for good sleep. It s very easy to use. I love that it has the option to use lighted or no light, and I love how the lights change colors. I recommended this to a relative. She bought one and loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy A.

customer_reviews.title: ... had diffuser for three months and it is in perfect condition. I clean it every weekend and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I Have had diffuser for three months and it is in perfect condition. I clean it every weekend and it works amazing. The best feature about this product is its easy button control and light show. There is a variety of colors but by one touch of the power button the lights will turn off for Pm. You can use different oils in it like doterra and edens garden. The rumor of using different oils for different diffusers stays true. Overall great product worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Wright

customer_reviews.title: this diffuser is the best on the market
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this diffuser is the best on the market. Before we had a cheaper one that stopped working within a few weeks. This one, however, is way better; it runs all day (provided you refill it regularly), and it's ready to go the next day without fail. We like it so much we just bought two more.
customer_reviews.author: KimW

customer_reviews.title: The young living ones have worked much better for us
customer_reviews.text: It broke after about three months. Started sputtering and quit working. The young living ones have worked much better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Cyle Lewis

customer_reviews.title: diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying my diffuser with a variety of oils. It runs about 3 hours and turns itself off when empty.
customer_reviews.author: Harry O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: First time oil diffuser user but I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to diffused oils so I cannot offer comparisons as this is my first diffuser. However, I love the changing colors and the auto shutoff feature as I run this at night as I lay down and like that it shuts off when the water goes out. It is quiet and I adore the aromas!
customer_reviews.author: S. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works well with my essentials oils to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works well with my essentials oils to help me with breathing on bad Asthma days. Also I was having trouble sleeping. Using this diffuser with my oils has helped me not only fall asleep, but also stay asleep :)
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sue Taylor

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Some diffusers the mist barely comes out but ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Some diffusers the mist barely comes out but not this one, clouds come out. Another nice feature is you can turn the light off if you use while sleeping. It's also very easy to put water in and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Debpow

customer_reviews.title: I actually really love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this purchase. I bought a essential oil sampler to go with it and it fills the room with the smells pretty well. And I love that it changes colors or you can chose to stop it in one color.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the diffuser almost every day for extended hours. It works perfectly and it's nice looking too. Makes a good night light.

customer_reviews.title: Really a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to someone with six grown children and LOTS of other relatives, all of whom have commented very positively and said that they want one. It works well and looks pretty, and honestly, I want one, too!
customer_reviews.author: imanuyawka

customer_reviews.title: You smell that?
customer_reviews.text: I put this in a stuffy attic room and fixed it right up. Never had one of these before, but I won't be without one in this room. I've used it frequently for several months without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: D_Man

customer_reviews.title: Fills the room with whatever oil scent you put in it and it's easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Works so well. It has a change color mode and an option to turn the color down. Fills the room with whatever oil scent you put in it and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. R. J. Trevivian

customer_reviews.title: This little diffuser is perfect for my rather small room
customer_reviews.text: This little diffuser is perfect for my rather small room. I love the option to turn the light off, but I do find that the blue power light is pretty bright. It looks nice in my room and is a great price. I only gave it 4 stars because of how bright the power light is. I have to cover it with something to keep the room dark. Other than that, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley A. Mealor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making your place smell amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this everyday. Nonstop since it arrived. I don't notice the essential oil benefits but I do love how it makes my apartment smell. I love picking out different oils for different scents.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It enhances the ambiance of any room and transmits a peaceful environment . Depending on the oils can improve your mood and possibly your health. Also a great gift. I vote spend on this!🙏

customer_reviews.title: Ouiet running
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't last all night, but enough to put me at ease with the lavender essential oil I use. I like that you can turn off the light. Quiet running machine.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I really love this diffuser. It is perfect and a nice size. I love the color changing mode. Highly recommend it. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 months, and stopped working.

customer_reviews.title: Rust on ceramic disc after just one use.
customer_reviews.text: Used it once. I put 80ml of distilled water with three drops lavender and two drops of ylang ylang. Afterwards, I cleaned the diffuser with water and vinegar and dried it. When I opened the lid, I noticed rust all around the ceramic disc. I own another diffuser from another brand, used the same blend of essential oils and it's fine. Will be returning.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my diffuser. It's very attractive, easy to use and it works wonderfully.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday in my sons rom. Leaves no water vapor on my wood furniture.

customer_reviews.title: My place smells amazing. The three light options are nice
customer_reviews.text: Works really well in my small-ish apartment. Plenty powerful enough for a 12'x12' bedroom and larger living room. My place smells amazing. The three light options are nice. If I want to sleep with it in the room, I just place something dark over the power light, which is pretty bright. Easy problem to fix.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as well as the "name brand" diffusers. This one was very weak and barely diffused anything. I was hoping to save some money by buying a cheaper diffuser, but once again I was reminded...you get what you pay for. The lights were pretty though, but it didn't produce much scent even in a small room with the door closed.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected, I love that it turns itself off when empty.

customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, but they work. Half the price of my Young Living Diffuser. I like the little pitcher it comes with.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works decent, but over priced, cheaply made and broke after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I used this lightly for about 6 months. worked well enough but is very light plastic. you can tell it took pennies to make, not worth $50. After 6 months it completely stopped working. The light flashes when I press the power button but it immediately shuts off.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my living room and loved the colors
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my living room and loved the colors . . . for the two times I used it. Totally stopped working.

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Only worked 2 months! It was good for an average size room.
customer_reviews.author: gregg

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Nice design.
customer_reviews.text: I have now had the opportunity to use this device for several weeks. It continues to perform very well, and I love the design. I recommend this device and this company highly. I have had this device for less than a week, but so far it it is performing well, and it is nicely designed. It is very easy to use and to clean. It cuts off when it the water is all used. No problems with it burning itself out from running dry. I find myself using less essential oil than I have used with other devices. I highly recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Diffuser Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and only diffuser I have owned! I absolutely love it and have owned it for about 4 years now and it still works like I just got it! Comes with the measuring cup to pour the water in and I add 2-3 drops of my favorite essential oil, put the top back on and press the only button on the machine. It lights up different colors when it's turned on but you can have it set at a single color or not have the light on at all. Would be great in a nursery or children's bedroom as well. I would repurchase this! Hope this helps anyone with doubts.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H

customer_reviews.title: Would make a great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the diffuser for about 2 months now. It has operated flawlessly. I think the design is a little larger than I would like, but that would not be a reason I wouldn't recommend the product. It comes with a small cup so the correct amount of water is used. I have to set the diffuser on the opposite side of the room I am sitting. If I sit near the diffuser, the essential oils can be a little overwhelming (some...not all). Overall a great product that I would buy again. I will be giving this as a Christmas gift this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: It was larger than I thought it was going to be. This is a plus. It is well designed. Very easy to use. I love that it has the ability to have a light on or off. It automatically shuts off as well.
customer_reviews.author: artsygirl

customer_reviews.title: First stab at aroma therapy and I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about aroma therapy when I took a chance and got this. Now I can admit that I LOVE it. The mister works wonderfully to disperse the oils ( we change oil types and mixtures each evening as we go to bed. The scent quickly fills the entire room 12x12. The auto shut off works to keep us from having to worry about shutting it off. The colored light, which I thought I would dislike, is a nice addition to our bedroom as we drift off to sleep. Going to buy another of the same model for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Area Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: So great, I purchased another!
customer_reviews.text: I think it's pretty sneaky of this company to make such a perfect little product. In fact, I think they PLANNED for my children to fight over this just so I would have to purchase another. Which, I fell for. Well played, Zaq...well played. This emits just the right amount of "vapor", it's super easy to clean, a breeze to relocate, and a cinch to refill. And it looks cool while doing all that. Purchased one in black then another in white and love them both!
customer_reviews.author: AZSunDevil

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but the power button cast so much light
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but the power button cast so much light, it was impossible for me to sleep. I had to turn it off. It's nice if you don't want to use it in your bedroom or if you want to use it in a child's bedroom as the power button's glow would serve as a nightlight, though.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working 4 months after purchase.

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome!

Note- the black part looks plasticky- but it has four settings with color changes. All in all a great purchase! I bought a set of oils that go wonderfully with it.

product_meta.title: ZAQ Dew Essential Oil Diffuser LiteMist Ultrasonic Aromatherapy With Ionizer and Color-Changing Light - 80 ML Capacity, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackDew drops are nature’s morning refreshment ­ and the inspiration for our Dew diffuser... and fresh has never looked so good. 

Aromatherapy is about new beginnings and healthy lifestyle, from your body to your spirit. Every day is ushered in with early morning dew, signalling the start of new opportunities and good wishes, which is what inspired us to design the ZAQ Dew. The unique design, like a water droplet, creates a unique and trendy accent for your space while the shape reminds you to grab hold of the opportunities each day brings and live life to the fullest. The multi­color LED lights remind us that life is ever changing and illuminating. 

Why get an Aromatherapy Diffuser? 
You may be asking yourself this question as you read through our product descriptions. Doubly so if this is your first time using essential oils or trying out aromatherapy. Well, before you go any further, read our Aromatherapy 101 article on our blog. 

Done reading? Good! 

To provide you with an extraordinary aromatherapy experience, ZAQ uses a LiteMist aromatherapy system. This method of diffusing essential oils sends the relaxing, soothing and invigorating aromatherapy oils into the air where you can benefit the most from them. 

How LiteMist Aromatherapy works: 
● You add water and your essential oil of choice to the diffuser 
● The diffuser breaks up this water­ essential oil mixture into millions of microparticles and shoots them out in a stream of mist 
● The mist is then absorbed by your body (both through your skin and through inhalation) 
● The activated ingredients in the essential oils then go to work, relaxing or invigorating you as they are wont to do 
● As an added bonus, the aromas of the essential oils give your space a pleasant smell 

Warranty 
ZAQ Dew includes 1 year Limited Warranty
feature_bullets: Dewdrop­-shape is topped by multi­color LED lights that inspire, refresh and invigorate
LiteMist aromatherapy system silently mists essential oils into your space
As a mid­sized diffuser (7.1′′ x 4.2′′), it is the perfect size for your home-­office, work space, conference room, hotel lobby or massage parlor.
Energy efficient, this 80ml capacity machine runs for up to 4 hours before needing to be refilled-and the auto shut off ensures safe operating, even if you forget it’s on (because it’s so quiet)
ZAQ Dew is BPA free and made of safe, health-­friendly materials
